targets.query:
from(bucket: "thechantry")
  |> range(start: -48h, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["network"] == "thechantry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["varkey"] == "state") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "$device") 
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: $device

items.description: Arrow facing up down left right

targets.query:
from(bucket: "thechantry")
  |> range(start: -48h, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["network"] == "thechantry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["varkey"] == "state") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "$device") 
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: $device

items.description: Arrow facing up down left right
items.name: arrow-up-down-left-right

         style="font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:bold;font-stretch:normal;font-size:1.41111112px;font-family:Roboto;-inkscape-font-specification:'Roboto Bold';fill:#333333;stroke-width:0.30424619">#device</tspan></text>
    <text
       xml:space="preserve"
       style="font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:300;font-stretch:normal;font-size:1.23472226px;line-height:1.25;font-family:Roboto;-inkscape-font-specification:'Roboto Light';text-align:center;letter-spacing:0px;word-spacing:0px;text-anchor:middle;fill:#333333;fill-opacity:1;stroke:none;stroke-width:0.30424619"
       x="101.32997"
       y="69.325073"

       varkey="#varkey"><tspan
         sodipodi:role="line"
         id="tspan880"

</svg>

targets.query:
from(bucket: "thechantry")
  |> range(start: -48h, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["network"] == "thechantry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["varkey"] == "state") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "$device") 
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
